achievements.title: Created my very first website 👨‍💻
achievements.description: I'm not sure when exactly I used HTML the first time to create a website and make it accessible to the world. But I still remember I used Geocities to host it. What a time.

achievements.title: Learned the electric guitar 🎸
achievements.description: Playing guitar is one of maybe 2 hobbies that stayed with me since I started it. I love rock and metal and being able to play some of my favorite songs still is a lot of fun.

achievements.title: Became a dad 🐣
achievements.description: Not that I had that much to do with the process of the creation, but this the one thing I'm most proud of.

achievements.title: Implemented a SAP-to-Shopware-API 👨‍💻
achievements.description: Using Shopware 6 I realized a REST API which communicated orders to a SAP instance. It also could receive things like stock and product information to update the product catalog.

achievements.description: Chris was kind enough to put so much trust in me that he gave me the position of CTO. Since then I took on a lot of further responsibilities and honed my skills in a multitude of areas.

achievements.title: Rewrote a Vue.js website to AlpineJS 👨‍💻
achievements.description: I replaced Vue.js with AlpineJS for one of our ecommerce clients and realized nearly double the old performance score. I wrote about it here.

achievements.title: Learned Eleventy 👨‍💻
achievements.description: In summer 2021 I wanted to rewrite my website and was searching for a new tech stack. I found Eleventy and realized it was a good fit.

achievements.title: Learned the 7-string guitar 🎸
achievements.description: Although 'learned' is a strong word, but after buying my first 7-string I finally found the time to really play with it and get better at it.

achievements.title: Deployed my first serverless function 👨‍💻
achievements.description: Using Cloudflare Workers I deployed two functions to show my last scrobble on my website.

achievements.title: Creating a Web-based Times Table Tool for My Child
achievements.description:
Traditional paper-based multiplication tables can be dull and monotonous. So, I developed a program to make learning multiplication engaging for my child.
Feel free to try it here.

achievements.title: Reached > 3000 clicks in a month through search engines

achievements.title: Dived deeper into the world of automation
achievements.description: I've always been interested in automating things. But in 2023 I really dived deeper into the world of automation. Driven by the goal of removing mundane tasks from the todo list of our team and myself, I've created many workflows that allowed us to remove those bullshit tasks from our agenda.
